title: wrote UE24...141B instead of UE24...151B today. Does it matter? What can I do?

comments.body: sorry but you're isa 1 marks are not going to be considered anymore, also they might even make you withdraw from the subject altogether as they'll believe you were absent or negligent and >!im not kidding!<>!really not a joke !<>!jk/s!<

did you circle it or just write it?
If you circled it correctly then it shouldn’t be a problem.
go to coe, where they will ask you to write a letter (letter of request form)about your concern then submit

My friend bubbled the wrong SRN in her ISA. Her class coordinator contacted her the very next day, and she had to go to the COE office and write a letter. Her paper got corrected without any issues.
If your class coordinator doesn’t contact you in a couple of days, it’s better if you reach out to them yourself.
Thanks for letting me know, I'll get this rectified tomorrow
hey what if you write the wrong semester? I wrote sem 1 instead of sem 2 in one of the papers

Naahh when I was in p cycle I had bubbled the code incorrectly, and I was so much stressed abt it 
But luckily nothing happened and it got corrected properly 
But better keep an eye on it !
